data.name: Fishing Planet: Char Charger's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Gather up, anglers! This May everyone’s talking about the final Tournament of the spring season - an epic Char quest of hunting down all kinds of Trout as well as beauties like Splake ‘n Dolly Varden. The hit list is ablaze with feisty underwater opponents that require profound fish combating skills!
But even with the right techniques and quite a bit of luck you’ll still need some muscular tackle to see your chances of victory truly skyrocket! In that case, Char Charger’s Pack is your first class ticket to outer space!
This limited edition tackle pack includes all unique collectibles with kosher Tournament performance potential! You get the unrivaled musclepower of CCO ChargerBlade™ and NRGizer™ spinning rods, the supercharged potential of CCO OmniVolt™ and FireBall™ spin reels, the champion swag of CCO SpeedyLite™ fishing jacket - all exclusively designed as official Char Charger’s Open collectibles! Not to mention a whole bundle of goodies including all the terminal tackle, equipment and licenses you need to enjoy your Char fishing, regardless of whether or not you’ll be among the confident daredevils to partake the challenging endeavour of the Char Charger’s Open showdown!

CHAR CHARGER'S PACK includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS - use to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses.
* 20 BAITCOINS - use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 7-DAY PREMIUM Enjoy seven days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience for catching fish and x2 Credits for selling your catch! In addition, you get the opportunity to rent a kayak with a 50% discount! You also get to register in Competitions for free!
* 35 Storage Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS:
Rods:
* CCO ChargerBlade™ 9' 6" (290) - Length: 9' 6" (2.9 m); Lure Weight: 5/7 – 1 3/4 Oz. (20-50 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 6–21 Lb. (3.5-9.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
* CCO NRGizer™ 7' 10" (240) - Length: 7' 10" (2.4 m); Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz. (18-56 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 15 – 42 lb (7-19.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
Reels:
* CCO OmniVolt™ 5000 - Ratio: 4.6:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 32/100 (0.5/100), braid 30/170 (0.28/170); Max Drag: 18.7 Lb. (8.5 kg)
* CCO FireBall™ 6000 - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 40 Lb. (18 kg)

TERMINAL TACKLE:
* Lines:
Mono .014" (0.35 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 16 Lb. (7.2 kg)
Fluoro .022" (0.55 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 35 Lb (15.8 kg)
* Spoons: Single Spoon 1 Oz. (28 g), #2/0 (x3); Single Spoon 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x3)
* Spinners: Bullet Spinner 1 1/4 Oz. (36 g), #4/0 (x2); Bullet Spinner 5/6 Oz. (24 g), #2/0 (x2)
* Jig Heads: JigHead 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0; JigHead 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0; JigHead 2 Oz. (56 g), #6/0
* Nymphes: Nymphes 4" (10 cm) (x4)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 6 ft. (2 m) #5/0, Crankbait 12 ft. (3.5 m) #2/0; Crankbait 16 ft. (5 m) #3/0, Crankbait 23 ft. (7 m) #4/0, Crankbait 30 ft. (9 m) #4/0

EQUIPMENT:
* CCO SpeedyVest™ Fishing Jacket - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2
* CCO PowerBox™ Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 2
* FishFort XL - Max Single Fish Weight: 55 Lb. (25 kg); Total Fish Weight: 330 Lb. (150 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced Alaska License

This May everyone’s talking about the final Tournament of the spring season - an epic Char quest of hunting down all kinds of Trout as well as beauties like Splake ‘n Dolly Varden. The hit list is ablaze with feisty underwater opponents that require profound fish combating skills!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
